Package hms.boundary

Class View

java.lang.Object
hms.boundary.View
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddMedicineView, AddPatientView, AddStaffView, AppointmentOutcomeRecordView, AppointmentView, AvailabilityView, ChangePasswordView, DisplayStaffView, InventoryManagementView, LoginView, ManageStaffView, MedicalRecordView, PatientMenuView, PendingRequestView, RemoveMedicineView, RemoveStaffView, ReplenishRequestView, ResetPasswordView, ScheduleView, SetStockWarningView, ShowMedicationInventoryView, StaffView, StartView, SubmitReplenishmentRequestView, UpdateMedicineView, UpdatePatientMedicalRecordView, UpdatePersonalInfoView, UpdatePrescriptionStatusView, UpdateStaffView, ViewReplenishmentRequestView
public abstract class View extends Object
An abstract class representing a general view in the system. It provides functionality to display a logo and header, as well as methods for displaying bordered text with customizable width.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    abstract void
    displayHeader()
    An abstract method that must be implemented by subclasses to display a specific header for the view.
    static void
    displayLogo()
    Displays the logo of the system in ASCII art.
